page.title: 08Influence of Seasonal Trade
page.content: Midland Bank and Post Office. Mostly connected with the tourist trade,dancing, Skating rink. Small fair ground , Bingo and amusement arcades etc. Local talent shows during the summer months and Christmas season Entertainment in holiday camp clubs.Several cafes bingo halls, Discos 'One armed bandits' hair dressers, keep fit classes and sports and sequence dancing. Summer carnival, angling competitions, Donkey derby, Rodeo, Church and Charity fetes. Visitors are attracted from both holiday makers and the outlying villages.
